History of R project:
1993 Project begins in NZ
1997 R-core forms
2000 v1.0 release
2003 R Foundation formed
2017 10,000 packages on CRAN
2020 R 4.0.0 released

#Rstats tip of the day: To report results in Rmarkdown documents, instead of subsetting dataframes by rows and columns, use `deframe()` from {tibble} to convert the table in a named vector! https://t.co/RxQjF275ea
